content:
Based on the above information create a heading for each and write a short paragraph about each of the following points: 
 • Roland RP-107 is an entry-level digital 88-note digital piano
 • Competes in a crowded sub-$1500 market alongside Kawai KDP 75, KDP 120, and Yamaha Arias YDP 145 and 165
 • Replaces the RP-102 model
 • Features the new BMC chip and updated Supernatural piano engine
 • Similar piano tone experience to Roland FP-30X and GP3 digital grand piano
 • No discrete audio jacks; line-out is through the headphone jack
 • Supernatural engine provides a fat attack and works well for contemporary and jazz playing
 • PHA-4 key action is professional-grade, with triple sensor and escapement (let-off)
 • Key weighting is slightly on the heavier side, similar to a large upright or small baby grand piano
 • 8-watt speakers provide more detail than other models in the price range due to an efficient design and front tone ports
 • Comes with a stand, triple pedal, and bench included
 • 15 tones available, including e-pianos and strings; ability to layer sounds
 • Only available in black finish
 • Bluetooth MIDI and audio connectivity; compatible with Roland Piano App
 • Over 300 preloaded songs, including play-along repertoire from popular method books

Please write in English language.
